hero.title: Discussion & Community
hero.subtitle: Join our community to ask questions, share insights, and discuss mathematics.

articles.title: GitHub Discussions & Issues
articles.content: Our primary platform for discussion. Ask questions, share ideas, and collaborate on GitHub. Access our repository for technical discussions.

articles.title: Email
articles.content: Prefer email? Reach us at Ake.coe.aki@gmail.com. We read and respond to all messages.

items: Be Respectful — Treat others with dignity. We welcome all perspectives.
Be Clear — Ask and answer questions as clearly as possible.
Be Honest — Acknowledge when you don't know something. Admit mistakes.
Give Attribution — Credit those whose work you build upon.
Stay on Topic — Keep discussions focused on mathematics and learning.
No Spam or Harassment — Keep the community safe and welcoming.

articles.title: Ask a Question
articles.content: Stuck on a concept? Don't understand a proof? Ask in the discussion forum. Include what you've tried and where you're stuck.

articles.title: Share an Insight
articles.content: Discovered a neat way to think about a concept? Share it! Help others understand by explaining what helped you.

articles.title: Report a Problem
articles.content: Found an error or unclear explanation? Let us know on GitHub or via email so we can improve.

articles.title: Suggest Improvements
articles.content: Have ideas for new topics, features, or content? We'd love to hear your suggestions.

articles.title: Understanding Limits
articles.content: A discussion about intuitive approaches to learning limits. How do different people develop understanding?

articles.title: Proof Techniques
articles.content: Exploring different approaches to mathematical proofs. What makes a proof elegant or difficult?

articles.title: Real-World Applications
articles.content: Discussing how algebra, calculus, and statistics apply to real-world problems. Share your examples!

articles.content: What strategies work best for learning mathematics? How do you build intuition?
